title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
For the full job description, including status updates and instructions on how to apply, please visit this posting.

Company: At DocSpot, weâ€™re trying to help people make better healthcare decisions. Our main service helps patients find doctors, dentists, and therapists based on criteria that are important to them. Check out https://www.docspot.com to explore our doctor search engine for yourself.

Role: Help bring transparency to the world of health care. For several years, DocSpot has been working to index a plethora of data about healthcare providers from a variety of sources. We are now turning our attention towards making that data useful to patients looking for a new provider, whether that be a doctor, a dentist, or a therapist. The work will involve much HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and some amount of Java and JSP.

Requirements:
- Legal right to work within the US
- Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Bachelor's degree (does not have to be in computer science); if you do not have a degree but think that you would still be a good fit, feel free to contact us through the email address below to discuss further

We tend to value raw intellect combined with a strong work ethic more than professional experience. While we do value experience, it is not required. We are willing to train the right candidate.
